repairedDockerfile:
FROM adoptopenjdk:15.0.2_7-jre-hotspot-focal

MAINTAINER Ren√© Reitmann <reitmann@dzhw.eu>

VOLUME /tmp

# use unpacked spring boot jar to avoid file io
COPY target/app /app/
COPY run.sh run.sh

# add kill agent for correct OutOfMemory Handling
RUN apt update \
 &&  apt install -y --no-install-recommends curl\
 &&  rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
 && curl -f https://java-buildpack.cloudfoundry.org/jvmkill/bionic/x86_64/jvmkill-1.16.0-RELEASE.so --output /app/jvmkill.so \
 && apt remove curl -y \
 && apt autoremove -y

ENTRYPOINT ["/run.sh"]
